metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14905 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Ansible Engine versions 2.9.x before 2.9.3,2.8.x before 2.8.8, 2.7.x before 2.7.16 and earlier, where in Ansible'snxos_file_copy module can be used to copy files to a flash or bootflash onNXOS devices. Malicious code could craft the filename parameter to performOS command injections. This could result in a loss of confidentiality ofthe system among other issues.

criterions.comment: ansible package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
